name: StreamJam Round One
description:
What's this?  Fan art you can play? Stream Jam is here! Choose your favorite content creator and battle to become the best in the digital realm!

Battle against your friends in local co - op, practice with MeowMeow , and or challenge the AI in arcade mode then take those hard earn MOW Coins to the arcade room to test out some of our demos!

If you have a low end computer be sure to disable arcade screens by clicking the MOW coin with your player select cursor.

Plays best with a gamepad.

All music is safe to stream anywhere.
